rules_text:
Surveil 2 [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
{5}{B}, Exile Recover Assets from your graveyard: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
notes:
1B Raise Dead —> 5B Reanimate
**Needed reanimate effect for Bigfoot. Also plays well with the front half.

Redflag — Wordy
